item.description:
Hi,
We would like to propose some meetup sessions relative to 'real world' AWS usage scenarios.
Examples:
- Monitoring / Managing your Microsoft infrastructure in the AWS cloud
- Leveraging AWS to run your SQL environment
- Run your Dev Ops in the AWS cloud
- Security practices : Swap Meet (share ideas & best practices)
- Backing up your network via AWS Storage Gateway

And many more...
Please advise if we can discuss moving forward. We would be happy to assist with leading the effort!

Thanks,
Adrian duCille
508 801 0314 (m)
617 832 9228 (office)

group.name: The Boston Amazon Web Services Meetup Group

item.name: AWS Community - Contributions & Thought Leadership
